name: VIP
sql: SELECT 1 FROM `customer_entity` AS `root` WHERE ((IF((SELECT 1 FROM `customer_entity` AS `main` INNER JOIN `customer_entity` AS `entity_table` ON main.entity_id = entity_table.entity_id WHERE (main.entity_id = :customer_id) AND (`main`.`email` = 'vip@thelumastory.com') AND (entity_table.website_id = :website_id) LIMIT 1), 1, 0) = 1))
